subject: fix: simplify PWA update logic to eliminate race conditions
body:
The previous implementation had multiple layers of flags (sessionStorage,
statechange listeners, suppressUpdateBannerRef) trying to work around
race conditions that resulted from the fundamental approach.

The new approach is simpler and more reliable:
1. Register SW and detect waiting workers normally
2. On update click: send SKIP_WAITING, set flag, clear UI state
3. Reload ONLY on controllerchange AND only if user initiated

Key changes:
- Removed sessionStorage UPDATE_RELOAD_KEY hack
- Removed statechange listener waiting for 'activated'
- Use controllerchange as the sole reload trigger
- Single userClickedUpdateRef flag gates reload behavior
- Bumped SW cache version to v5 for clean slate
